official_title: A bill prohibiting the collection of certain user fees by the United States Coast Guard.

summary.text: Prohibits funds that are authorized to be appropriated for fiscal years after September 30, 1981, from being expended for the collection of user fees imposed by the United States Coast Guard for its services.

titles.title: A bill prohibiting the collection of certain user fees by the United States Coast Guard.
